thread.title: Jennifer Garner makes 1st red-carpet appearance after Ben Affleck split
thread.title_full: Jennifer Garner makes 1st red-carpet appearance after Ben Affleck split - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Jennifer Garner makes 1st red-carpet appearance after Ben Affleck split
text:
Jennifer Garner returned to red carpet after splitting from husband Ben Affleck.
READ: Jennifer Garner can't imagine dating post-split from Ben Affleck
The actress looked elegant in a black outfit when attending the Private Dinner in Honor of Baby2Baby at Chanel Boutique in Los Angeles, reported Ace Showbiz.
The 49-year-old mother of three wore a sleeveless knee-length dress paired with strappy heels. She was joined at the event by fellow female stars like Rachel Bilson, Ellen Pompeo, Jenna Dewan-Tatum, and Selma Blair.
Baby2Baby co-founder Kelly Sawyer was in attendance as well. The September 29 event is held to celebrate the organization which helps provide low-income children with all the basic necessities like diapers and clothes.
Garner made her first public appearance after Affleck split at Think It Up telethon on September 11. She mingled with the likes of Jessica Biel, Halle Berry, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jeremy Renner, Joe Manganiello, Kristen Bell, and Jason Bateman for the good cause.
 Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner's 'cute pictures' before filing for divorce - TOI
